page.title: 18A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: I usually wake up at 7 o'clock,dress and go downstairs for breakfast.After two pieces of toast and a cup of tea I wash and get ready for school.My sister and I call for Kerry and we walk for fifteen minutes to school. We wait outside the classroom,chatt_ ing to our friends until we are told to go in at 9 o'clock.First the register is taken and people choose their lunch.I take sandwiches for lunch.Then it is over to the hall for assembly.I play my recorder.We have two lessons in the morning and a playtime for 15 minutes.Lunch is from noon until 1.15pm.Two more hours of school and then home. At home we have drinks and play until 5.30pm when we have tea.Then I practise my recorder for 30 minutes.I play until 8.00pm,watch television until 9.00pm and then it's off to bed.
